## CodeGenerator.workspaceToCode() method

Generate code for all blocks in the workspace to the specified language.

**Signature:**

```typescript
workspaceToCode(workspace?: Workspace): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | _(Optional)_ Workspace to generate code from. |

**Returns:**

string

Generated code.
